title: In the case of provisions of other Acts / Rules / Regulations which are incorporated in these regulations, the amendments made subsequently in parent Acts / Rules / Regulations, will automatically be applicable, wherever applicable, to these regulations
clause_text: In the case of provisions of other Acts / Rules / Regulations which are incorporated in these regulations, the amendments made subsequently in parent Acts / Rules / Regulations, will automatically be applicable, wherever applicable, to these regulations.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
